      • cdf

        public static double cdf(double z)
        standard Gaussian cdf using Taylor approximation;
        Parameters:
        z - parameter of the function
        Returns:
        the probability that a random variable distributed according to the standard normal distribution (mean = 0 and stdev = 1) produces a value less than z

        z - parameter of the function
        mu - mean
        sigma - stddev sigma
        Returns:
        he probability that a random variable X distributed normally with mean mu and stdev sigma produces a value less than z
